titleStmt.title: A great and bloody fight at sea on Monday 16 August, neere Plimouth: between Sir George Ayscue and the Holland fleet. From one a clock in the afternoone, untill eight a clock at night. With a list of the particulars of the losse on both sides.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Ibbitson dwelling in Smithfield neer Hosier Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
